llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1 (March 27th): Miami to Dallas

* Depart from Miami International Airport in the morning
* Fly from Miami to Dallas on American Airlines flight AA2357, departing at 9:00 AM and arriving at 12:46 PM (duration: 3 hours 46 minutes)
* Upon arrival, pick up rental car and drive to Indian restaurant in Richardson for lunch
* After lunch, head to Dallas city center for sightseeing, including the Dallas Arboretum and Reunion Tower
* Overnight stay at Hyatt Place Dallas/Lakewood

Day 2 (March 28th): Dallas to Houston

* Depart from Dallas in the morning
* Drive to Houston via I-45 North (duration: 3 hours 47 minutes)
* Have Indian lunch at Tamarind for their famous chicken tikka masala
* Visit Space Center Houston and take a tour of NASA's past and present missions
* In the evening, enjoy Mediterranean dinner at The Bros. BBQ & Grill
* Overnight stay at JW Marriott Houston Downtown

Day 3 (March 29th): Houston to Austin

* Depart from Houston in the morning
* Drive to Austin via TX-10 W (duration: 4 hours 56 minutes)
* Have brunch at The Buzz Million Bubble Tea & Coffee House for a unique dining experience
* Visit the Texas State Capitol Building and take a tour of the city's historic landmarks
* For dinner, enjoy Mediterranean cuisine at Odd Duck
* Overnight stay at JW Marriott Austin

Day 4 (March 30th): Austin to Miami

* Depart from Austin in the morning
* Drive to San Antonio via I-35 S (duration: 2 hours 19 minutes)
* Visit The Alamo and Riverwalk for lunch and sightseeing
* After lunch, drive back to Miami via I-10 W (duration: 8 hours 47 minutes)
* Upon arrival, check in at The Biltmore Hotel for overnight stay

Day 5 (March 31st): Departure from Miami

* Spend the morning relaxing or exploring the city of Miami
* Depart from Miami International Airport in the afternoon for your onward journey

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $800 (AA2357 from Dallas to Houston, AA2361 from Houston to Austin, and AA2391 from Austin to Miami)
* Car Rental: $400 (for 5 days)
* Lodging: $3,300 (for 5 nights at Hyatt Place Dallas/Lakewood, JW Marriott Houston Downtown, JW Marriott Austin, and The Biltmore Hotel)
* Food and Activities: $1,800 (for Indian and Mediterranean dinners, as well as sightseeing tours and entry fees)
Total Budget: $8,500

Note: Prices are subject to change based on availability and seasonality. Please check with the service providers for the most up-to-date pricing information.
